title: 01/04/21 -HOUR 3 - Aaron Rodgers, Jim Donovan
itunes:title: 01/04/21 -HOUR 3 - Aaron Rodgers, Jim Donovan
description:
In the 3rd hour the guys discuss the QB situation in Green Bay, and how Jordan Love being the starting QB may not happen so soon after all. Nick Saban is considering Adam Gase & Bill O'Brien for Offensive Coordinator position. Jim Donovan joins to talk the excitement in the city of Clevand, being the Browns have finally ended they're playoff drought and more.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
